titleStmt.title: SII 7.891: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 891. (A.R. No. 263 of 1902). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE MANDAPA IN FRONT OF THE SAME SHRINE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
tirumaṉṉi vaḷara Irunila maṭantaiyum poṟcaeyap pāvaiyuñ cirttaṉic celviyun taṉ perun=teviyarākki Iṉpuṟa neṭutuyar Ūḻiyu ḷiṭaituraināṭu n=tuṭarvaṉavelippaṭar vaṉavāciyuñ cuḷḷiccūḻ matiṭ koḷḷippākkaiyum naṇṇaṟkarumuraṇa maṇṇaikkaṭakkamum porutaṭa liḻattaraiyar tam muṭiyu māṅkavar teviya roṅkeḻil muṭiyu muṉṉavarpakkal teṉṉavar vaitta cun=tiramuṭiyu min=tara ṉāramu n=teṇṭirai Īḻamaṇṭalamuḻuvatu meṟipaṭai r muṟaimaiyiṟc cūṭuṅ kulataṉamākiya palar pukaḻ muṭiyuñ ceṅ velait tolperuṅkāvaṟ palpaḻan=tivu māpporun taṇṭāṟ koṇṭa kopparakecaripanmarāṉa śrīrājentracoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu Āṟāvatu malāṭāṉa janaṉātavaḷanāṭṭuk kuṟukkaikkūṟ
ṟattut tirukkovalūrt tiruviraṭṭāṉamuṭaiya mahādevar śrīpaṇṭāram Iṉṉāṭu kaṇkāṇināyakañ Iḷamaṅkalamuṭaiyā ṉiccal śrīyārur Ittevar śrīpaṇṭārañ coticcu śrīpaṇṭārappottakappaṭi nilaiyurukkaṇṭu muṉpu kalveṭ ṭillātaṉa kalveṭṭuvittapaṭi . periyapaṭṭam Añciṉāl paḻaṅkācukallāl niṟai poṉ Aññūṟṟuk kaḻañce mañcāṭiyu miraṇṭumāvum ciṟiyapaṭṭam nāliṉāl niṟai poṉ patiṉāṟ kaḻañceraiye mañcāṭiyum poṟpū pattiṉāl kaḻañce mukkālu maṇi va ṉiṟai poṉ ṉūṟṟuk kaḻañci pātap ḷi toṇṇūṟṟu mukkaḻañcu Itaṉmel portta poṉ Aiñkaḻañ caraiye mañcāṭiyu miraṇṭumā paṭṭaivaḷaiyi lāṟiṉāl niṟai poṉ patiṉmuk kaḻañce Āṟumañcāṭiyu miraṇṭumāvum Āṭavallār
vaṭṭamaṇi paṉṉiraṇṭiṉāl niṟai poṉ Irukaḻañcarai vaṭṭamaṇi kotta veḷḷi kaḻañca rān=takaṉ yātavabhīmaṉāṉa Uttamacoḻa malāṭuṭaiyāṉ Iṭṭa poṉṉiṉ maṭal Irājarājaṉkācukallāl niṟai poṉ Irupattu Orukaḻañ caraiyiṉāl maṭalloṉṟum Uṭkaru vuḷḷa veṇcāmaraip poṟkai yiraṇṭum veḷḷit taḷikai yoṉṟiṉāl niṟai toḷāyirat taṟupattiru kaḻañcum veḷḷit taḷikai yoṉṟiṉāl niṟai Iruṉūṟṟuk kaḻañcum veḷḷit taṭṭa moṉṟu niṟai Aiympa ṉaṭṭa Oṉṟiṉāl kaḻañcaraiyum veḷḷi ṉ kaḻañcu ḷik kāḷāñci yoṉṟu niṟai Iruṉūṟ ṟiru patiṉ kaḻañcum veḷḷik kuṭa moṉṟu niṟai nānūṟ ṟorupat teṇkaḻañcum veḷḷik kuṭa moṉṟu niṟai nānūṟ ṟaimpattu nāṟkaḻañcum Iṉṉāṭukaṇkāṇi nā
Iḷamaṅkalamuṭaiyāṉ niccal śrīyārur Eḻun=taruḷuvitta Umāparamecuvarikku nāṇ Oṉṟu ṉṟu tirumuttukku kaḻañcu Iraṇṭu vāḷi yiraṇṭum poṟpū nālum kāṟkāṟai yiraṇṭum pāṭaka miraṇṭum kaṟkaṭṭiṉa motira moṉṟu vaḷaiyi liraṇṭum vaṭṭamaṇivaṭa moṉṟumāka Irājarājaṉkācukallāl cempoṉ niṟai paṉṉiru kaḻañce mañcāṭi Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.891 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
